backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, daily order storage, and karigar assignments with access control and query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to related frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing their roles in the daily orders and karigar workflow.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind setup defining OKLCH-based color variables and base styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing authentication, profile setup, layout, and routing to the daily orders page.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name using a profile mutation.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/compo: Dialog UI for assigning selected orders to a karigar and optional factory using a mutation.
Button component that exports the selected karigar’s orders as an HTML file, handling loading state.
Sidebar listing karigars and their order counts, allowing selection to filter orders by group.
Table displaying orders with selection checkboxes and assignment status per order.
Toolbar providing text search and design-based sorting controls for the orders list.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/Daily: Main page for uploading, viewing, filtering, assigning, and exporting daily orders, handling state, data loading, and grouping by karigar.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/excel: CSV-based parser that extracts order fields from uploaded files and validates required columns.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/hooks: Hook that filters and sorts orders based on search text and design sort order.
frontend/src/features/daily-orders/pdf/e: Generates an HTML-based report for a karigar’s orders and triggers a file download.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, auto-refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context and provider for loading, logging in, and clearing user identities using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, daily orders, and karigar assignments through the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light/dark modes using OKLCH color definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/types/jspdf.d.ts: Empty type definition placeholder for jspdf.
frontend/src/types/xlsx.d.ts: Empty type definition placeholder for xlsx.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and session storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom OKLCH-based theme.
project_state.json: Describes project state, requirements, and features for a manual Excel-based order management workflow.
